competitors.name: Cadence Design Systems
competitors.notes: Primary competitor with 36% market share (vs. Synopsys's 38%), controlling 74% of EDA market together

competitors.name: Mentor Graphics
competitors.notes: Part of the 'Big Three' oligopoly, later acquired by Siemens in 2017

context: Synopsys, Inc. is a electronic design automation company focused on chip design software, IP, and software security. Software integrity group. Application security.
